Text: Tack sì±… mycket! Muchas gracias! Merci beaucoup! Vielen Dank! La ringrazio molto! Thanks m8!  Nice appz!
Thank you very much. I used it for an old sony laptop which had lots of brocken sectors. They all got repaired so it worked!
THANKS! I sure hope this program can save a hard drive, where SpinRite 6.0 seems to not be able too.

Just an update from a tech for anyone curious. My previous computer proved to shared both a bad mother board (started freezing on Bios Splash screen- "GATEWAY" upon boot-up) - And yet the only known competition, long lived SpinRite HD program (Too High at $90.00!!) could not repair that hard drive either- Both programs failed as they well should on a HD that was friend out of this world. I admit such programs adds some reinforcement when one really wants to peg down exactly what problems there are with a drive AND what other hardware issues there are. HDD helped me conclude the other computer had a mother board issue as well because of the way the hard drive was checked. So this program and SpinRite both seem to serve a useful purpose when trying to extend the life of a failing hard drive, or wishing to maintain one so it lasts longer, as no destructive data is done unless one runs a format or Fdisk first.

Thanks for this small and heavily protective option to SpinRite with keygen and instructions. A good hard drive sector analysis program for PCs are pretty darn rare!

 I wish we had more uploads by the MODS because I feel we can trust you guys more. (even if I have yet to upload yet). THANKS!! 

This program will be very valuable despite the fact I could never afford to buy it being jobless.

Thanks so much for this...I have a 2 terrabite external hard drive and somehow i messed up the partition when installing a new operating system.I had over 900 gigs worth of movies and tv shows and I thought i lost them all....5 years worth of saved video....now i have them back....thank you!!!!!!!
